rComments: She was a very sweet professor. I warn you in general that this class was at times very heated, and led to some awkward and at times offensive discussion; in this way I felt bad because Leslie had a difficult time trying to bring students back to her attention. On essay feedback she is amazing. Attendance is needed and be ready to talk.

Such a sweet, understanding and happy professor. If you have an issue with anything at all, she is willing to help you during office hours. She gives really good commentary on essays and has definitely made me a stronger writer.

I took this for a GE and have no interest in creative writing, even as a lit major. Juliana is great, very sweet, and kept class interesting. Living Writers is mandatory and impacts your grade so GO! Even though I thought I'd suck at this, she was very nice and not judgmental.
